text: Sergei Vladimirovich Timofeyev (; born 26 June 1981 in Volgograd) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Rotor Volgograd players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Kazakhstan Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Association football defenders
title: Sergei Timofeyev (footballer, born 1981)
